tool_description: Get a random harry potter spells name and its use on each request to any end point
name: Potter Spells
title: Potter Spells

api_list.name: /random
api_list.description: Get a random spell and its use
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://potter-spells.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "potter-spells.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://potter-spells.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "potter-spells.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
